v1.headline: Helping as many solopreneurs as I can to build their brand + business (so they can live their best life) | 100+ helped go from stuck to writing online, signing clients, and other wins
v1.about:
In 2023, I got laid off with no warning. So I decided to turn my side hustle into my full-time business: 

→ 2,000+ posts written
→ 100+ customers & clients
→ Became a top 1% creator
→ 1,000,000s of impressions
→ Became a Top Voice on LinkedIn™
→ Featured on 20+ podcasts and speaking appearances

The main thing I learned along the way: 

You don’t need more content.
You don’t need 100k followers.
You don’t need to chase trends.
You don’t need to pray to go viral.
You don’t need 1,000,000s of impressions.

You need a simple system that helps you:

→ Attract the right high-ticket clients from your content
→ Sell in a way that feels natural (not pushy or “salesy”)
→ Build a brand around your ideas and your story
→ Get leads without cold DMs or trend-chasing
→ Write content that works (and is fun)

Clarity is your best friend. And that's what I'll help you achieve.

Some examples of the system in action: 

→ AP: Overhauled his content strategy, built an email list of 100+, and started getting inbound leads just from the welcome sequence.
→ JM: Built his offer ladder, signed 3 multi-4-figure clients in 2 months, and hit capacity (whilst juggling a newborn baby).
→ MA: Wrote her thoughts into posts. One got 9,202 likes. Another got 4,212. All around their own thoughts and ideas (no chasing trends). 

2 ways I can help you right now: 

1/ Grab my free playbook in the featured section: It walks through the strategy behind my brand + business (I think you'll enjoy the section “A Different Type of Success Story”)

2/ DM me “coaching”: I’ll walk you through my 3-step programme and see if it’s a good fit. I keep 1 or 2 spots open for those ready to move.

I hope this gave you a clearer picture of what’s possible.

~ Luke
